post.description:
**Create new account**
----------------------------------

Service ini untuk create new account berdasarkan menu YOP ( OCA + AIM).
Data yang dikembalikan adalah norek internal, norek eksternal, tanggal pembukaan rekening.

- Nama Program : YGTWYOP0R
- ProCode : 640036

**Request Fields**

> No|Field|Description|awal|akhir|Type|Size|Dec|M/O|Format
> --|----|-------------|---|-----|----|----|---|------|-----
> 1|Operator|Operator FES|1|4|A|4||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 2|BRNM|Branch |5|8|A|4||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 3|CUS|CIF|9|14|A|6||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 4|CLC|Customer location|15|17|A|3||O|Right Padded Spaces
> 5|SFX|Suffix|18|20|A|3||O|Right Padded Spaces
> 6|SHN|Account Shortname|21|35|A|15||O|Right Padded Spaces
> 7|ACTP|Account Type|36|37|A|2||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 8|CCY|Currency|38|40|A|3||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 9|JAC|Joint Account|41|41|A|1||M|Y/N
> 10|OAD|Open Account Date|42|49|N|8||O|YYYYMMDD
> 11|EAN|External Account Number|50|69|A|20||O|Right Padded Spaces
> 12|TERM|Jangka waktu|70|72|N|3||M|Left Padded Zeros
> 13|AMT|Jumlah setoran bulanan|73|90|N|18|3|M|Left Padded Zeros
> 14|FLG|Flag Jenis Rekening Penerima|91|91|A|1||M|Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP' (1 : BTPN account, 2 : Others Bank Account)
> 15|RCV1|Rekening Penerima|92|126|A|35||M|Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP'
> 16|RCV2|Nama Penerima|127|161|A|35||M|Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP' and FLG = '2'
> 17|RCV3|Bank dan Cabang Penerima|162|196|A|35||M|Mandatory If ACTP = > 'EP' and FLG = '2'
> 18|DATA|Additional Info Data|197|2471|A|2275||M|Sesuaikan dengan DS Additional Info. Panjang dan value dinamis sesuai additional information item masing-masing tipe rekening.


**Response Fields**

> No|Field|Description|awal|akhir|Type|Size|Dec|Format
> --|----|--------|---|---|-----|----|----|----|------
> 1|ACCN|Internal Account Number|1|13|A|13||Right Padded Spaces
> 2|EAN|External Account Number|14|33|A|20||Right Padded Spaces
> 3|OAD|Date Account Opened|34|41|A|8||yyyymmdd

get.description:
**Get Account by account-no**
----------------------------------

Service ini untuk inquiry data rekening.
Data yang dikembalikan adalah data rekening mulai dari basic data, balance, dan juga special conditions.

- Nama Program : YGTWAE00R
- ProCode : 640039

**Request Fields**

> No|Field|Description|awal|akhir|Type|Size|Dec|M/O|Format
> --|---|------------|-----|-----|----|----|---|----|-----
> 1|USID|User ID|1|4|A|4||M|Right Padded Spaces
> 2|ACCN|Account Number|5|24|A|20||M|Right Padded Spaces

AM1D.description: Accrue up to today - -Left Padded Zeroes

BRRD.description: Debit base rate - Right Padded Spaces

AM1C.description: Accrue up to today - -Left Padded Zeroes

BRRC.description: Credit base rate - Right Padded Spaces

ACS.description: Account structure - M (movement), T (term), X (foreign exchange dealing account)

CNAI.description: Internal risk country - Right Padded Spaces

C1R.description: C1 User code - Right Padded Spaces

C2R.description: C2 User code - Right Padded Spaces

C3R.description: C3 User code - Right Padded Spaces

C4R.description: C4 User code - Right Padded Spaces

C5R.description: C5 User code - Right Padded Spaces

P1R.description: P1 User code - Right Padded Spaces

P2R.description: P2 User code - Right Padded Spaces

P3R.description: P3 User code - Right Padded Spaces

P4R.description: P4 User code - Right Padded Spaces

P5R.description: P5 User code - Right Padded Spaces

EAN.description: External Account Number - Right Padded Spaces

TERM.description: Jangka waktu - Left Padded Zeros, Mandatory if ACTP = 'EP'

AMT.description: Jumlah setoran bulanan - Left Padded Zeros, Mandatory if ACTP = 'EP'

FLG.description: Flag Jenis Rekening Penerima - Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP' (1 : BTPN account, 2 : Others Bank Account)

RCV2.description: Nama Penerima - Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP' and FLG = '2'

RCV3.description: Bank dan Cabang Penerima - Mandatory If ACTP = 'EP' and FLG = '2'

DATA.description: Additional Info Data - Sesuaikan dengan DS Additional Info.

DTC.description: DR Trans Code - Right Padded Spaces

CTC.description: CR Trans Code - Right Padded Spaces
